section:
Caught in a sudden downpour, you find shelter under the eaves of a small shrine. When the sun emerges from behind the clouds at last, it floods the wet fields with dazzling golden light. It is a scene of breathtaking beauty. No wonder that the people of Akatsurai revere all the gods of nature that surround them.
Go north to the forest Go south to the coast Go west towards Sakkaku Go east over the Moku River
